author: wn.com
title: NFL/LISC Grassroots program and Steelers grant $200,000 to help install turf at Windber Stadium (Pittsburgh ...
text: ( Source : Pittsburgh Steelers ) The Windber Area School District has been granted $200, 000 by the Pittsburgh Steelers through the National Football League Foundation Grassroots Program to install a synthetic turf football field at Windber
